Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Chicago/Kilbourn
ShortDescription: EB 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Cicero, Augusta, Pulaski and Chicago due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Cicero, Augusta, Pulaski and Chicago, due to street blockage near Chicago/Kilbourn.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
